value:
There are surely other Heroes
who are better suited to handing
out gifts...

So this is the winter festival of Askr...
I remember it well, from the days
fore I donned this mask.

This mask isn't a costume for the
festival masquerade, but I will allow
the children to think what they will.$k$pIt is not my place to correct them.

Each gift is met with a smile, and
each smile, something precious...
That much I can understand.

I must take care not to give someone
else the gift I chose for Veronica...

My name is— No, I'd better not.
Here is a winter-festival gift, from
$Nf. Take it.

Now that I've committed, there's no
turning back. We will make this an
unforgettable winter festival.

Instead of looking to see behind
my mask, why not simply enjoy
the winter festivities?

Ugh. All the eyes on me have put
me off balance...

I know I have caused you concern.
I hope my actions from here on
will quell any worry.

My name is of no importance.
I am simply an attendee, here
to enjoy the winter festival.

I've just finished delivering gifts
as part of the winter festival.$k$pThere is no difference between the
snow that falls in the Emblian Empire
and the snow here in Askr, I find.$k$pJust as there is no real difference in
the kind, warmhearted smiles shared
between citizens in each nation...$k$pI ought to take my leave, however.
If Alfonse and Sharena were to see
me here, it may be troublesome.$k$p...Ah. I see there are still some gifts
left to deliver—and gifts for Alfonse
and Sharena, no less.$k$pI can only pray I find them already
asleep. I'll have to remain on guard
until the festival's close, it seems...
What a festival it is!
The winter's blessing.
A gift. Here!
Hasten your slumber!
But the gifts...
Another costume? Is a change of attire really so diverting?
Huh? Do you mean to seek a gift as well?
If the gifts are sufficiently hefty, delivering them could be considered training. In a sense.
I am not hiding. I am simply waiting for Alfonse to pass.
Even a fleeting moment of calm is to be valued.
This is for Veronica. In truth, I do not know if she will like it.
To spend a night so serene with you... I will not soon forget it.
Very well.
Cold indeed.
Gifts for all.
